plot: A stark and gritty behind-the-scenes portrait of Art Baldwin, a grumpy retiree who for over twenty years worked the night shift as Santa Claus during the Christmas holiday season for Chicago's Marshall Field and Company department store.
title: The Santa Tapes
plot_es: A stark and gritty behind-the-scenes portrait of Art Baldwin, a grumpy retiree who for over twenty years worked the night shift as Santa Claus during the Christmas holiday season for Chicago's Marshall Field and Company department store.
plot_en: A stark and gritty behind-the-scenes portrait of Art Baldwin, a grumpy retiree who for over twenty years worked the night shift as Santa Claus during the Christmas holiday season for Chicago's Marshall Field and Company department store.
